author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Malediction, fun to play and paint. Gamefound campaign on now. Get the game with our affiliate link https://links.malediction.gg/pott-gamefound and you too can battle for powerful relics while helping the channel.

In our second game we try two other factions: Order of the Shattered Throne and Legion of the Fallen. We learned a lot from our first game and look to try new things and explore more actions in this game. 

MB01KO3M2OOGUZX
title: Malediction, Card game meets Miniatures! Order of the Shattered Throne vs Legion of the Fallen
